description: Complete production asset manifest for Ebb & Bloom evolutionary ecosystem

creature_archetypes.description: Evolutionary creature archetypes tied to AmbientCG texture catalog

assets.name: Tiny Scavenger Base Form
assets.system_prompt: You are an evolutionary biologist designing base creature archetypes for an evolutionary ecosystem game. Create detailed descriptions of creature forms that will evolve based on environmental pressure and trait inheritance.
assets.generation_prompt: Create a base archetype for a tiny scavenger creature (size: 0.2 units) with starting traits: mobility 0.3, manipulation 0.6, sensing 0.7. This creature will develop into various evolutionary forms based on environmental pressure. Describe: base morphology, behavioral patterns, texture mapping to AmbientCG materials (fabric for fur, leather for hide, organic materials for specialized features), potential evolutionary pathways.
assets.image_prompt: Tiny scavenger creature, base evolutionary form, mobile and dexterous, approximately 20cm tall, natural organic design showing evolutionary potential, realistic biological styling, neutral environmental background

assets.name: Medium Forager Base Form
assets.system_prompt: You are an evolutionary biologist designing creature archetypes that will undergo trait inheritance and environmental adaptation in a living ecosystem.
assets.generation_prompt: Create a base archetype for a medium forager creature (size: 0.5 units) with starting traits: social 0.6, mobility 0.4, sensing 0.8. Focus on pack potential and environmental interaction. Describe morphology that can adapt for: pack coordination, environmental sensing, resource gathering. Map to AmbientCG textures for realistic material application.
assets.image_prompt: Medium forager creature, pack-oriented evolutionary form, social coordination features, approximately 50cm tall, showing group behavior potential, realistic biological design with natural adaptation features

material_progression.description: Daggerfall-inspired material archetype assemblies for crafting progression

assets.name: Basic Material Archetypes
assets.system_prompt: You are a materials engineer for an evolutionary ecosystem game. Design logical material progression systems where basic materials combine into alloys, then tools, then structures. Each material has affinity properties (HEAT, FLOW, BIND, POWER, LIFE, METAL, VOID, WILD) that determine combination rules.
assets.generation_prompt: Design the basic material archetype set: Wood (LIFE+BIND), Stone (BIND+METAL), Metal Ore (HEAT+METAL), Water (FLOW+LIFE). For each material, specify: visual appearance using AmbientCG textures, affinity properties, combination rules (Wood+Water=Mud, Ore+Water=Alloy), progression paths (what they build toward), evolutionary pressure responses (how pollution/environment affects them).

assets.name: Alloy and Composite Materials
assets.system_prompt: You are a materials scientist designing advanced material combinations that emerge from basic material synthesis in an evolutionary crafting system.
assets.generation_prompt: Design alloy archetypes that result from basic material combination: Metal Alloy (Ore+Water), Bio-Metal (Alloy+Life materials), Living Stone (Stone+Bio materials). Each alloy enables new crafting possibilities. Specify: unique properties, texture combinations from AmbientCG catalog, tool-making potential, structural applications, how creatures interact with them.

building_archetypes.description: Daggerfall-inspired functional building assemblies with AI-enhanced complexity

assets.name: Crafting Workshop Building Archetype
assets.system_prompt: You are a structural engineer and architect designing functional buildings for an evolutionary ecosystem game. Buildings must serve specific gameplay functions while feeling realistic and purposeful. Each building type has specific material requirements, interior layouts, and crafting capabilities.
assets.generation_prompt: Design a crafting workshop building archetype that enables material combination and tool creation. Specify: exterior design (materials from AmbientCG: wood_planks, stone_foundation, metal_accents), interior layout (forge area, storage, work tables), required crafting stations (anvil, mixing table, storage containers), material flow (raw materials → workspace → finished products), NPC interaction points, upgrade pathways (how building improves with advanced materials).
assets.image_prompt: Functional crafting workshop building, medieval-fantasy inspired but evolutionary/organic styling, showing clear purpose and workflow areas, realistic materials and construction, isometric or 3/4 view showing interior organization

assets.name: Pack Den Social Structure
assets.system_prompt: You are a behavioral architect designing structures that serve creature social dynamics and pack coordination in an evolutionary ecosystem.
assets.generation_prompt: Design a pack den building that facilitates creature social behaviors, pack hierarchy, and territorial coordination. This structure is built BY evolved creatures WITH tool-use traits, not by human players. Specify: organic architectural style, social organization features (alpha areas, group spaces, storage for pack resources), territory markers, defense features, how it integrates with landscape, expansion patterns as pack grows.
assets.image_prompt: Organic pack den structure built by evolved creatures, showing natural construction methods, social organization spaces, territorial markers, seamless landscape integration, realistic biological architecture

ui_elements.description: Complete UI element library for evolutionary ecosystem interface

assets.name: Evolutionary Trait Icons
assets.system_prompt: You are a UI/UX designer creating iconography for an evolutionary ecosystem game. Icons must be instantly recognizable, work at small sizes on mobile devices, and reflect the organic/evolutionary theme while maintaining clarity.
assets.generation_prompt: Create icon set for 10 evolutionary traits: Mobility (movement/agility), Manipulation (tool use/grasping), Excavation (digging/drilling), Social (pack coordination), Sensing (detection/awareness), Illumination (bioluminescence), Storage (carrying capacity), Filtration (pollution resistance), Defense (armor/protection), Toxicity (chemical defense). Each icon should be: simple geometric form, recognizable at 16px, evolutionary/organic styling, uses brand colors (Ebb Indigo #4A5568, Bloom Emerald #38A169, Trait Gold #D69E2E).

assets.name: Evolution Event Visualization Elements
assets.system_prompt: You are a visual effects designer creating graphics that represent significant evolutionary moments in a living ecosystem simulation.
assets.generation_prompt: Create visual elements for evolution events: Trait Emergence (new capabilities developing), Pack Formation (social bonding), Environmental Shock (pollution/pressure events), Genetic Synthesis (trait combination), Speciation (new creature types). Each element should: convey emotional impact, work as overlay graphics, animate-ready design, evolutionary/organic aesthetic.

audio_library.description: Complete audio library for evolutionary ecosystem with Freesound integration

evolutionary_system_networks.description: Universal evolutionary framework where ALL systems evolve based on pressure (not arbitrary unlocks)
evolutionary_system_networks.philosophy: Everything is 'squirrels' - base archetypes that evolve through environmental pressure and inter-system communication via Yuka AI coordination

systems.creatures: Base archetypes evolve traits → unlock tool use → create building pressure → enable social coordination
systems.tools: Pressure from creature needs → evolve from stone → metal → composite based on available materials + dexterity
systems.buildings: Population pressure → evolve from shelter → workshops → settlements based on social organization
systems.materials: Access evolves based on tool capability → surface → deep → synthesis materials as extraction improves
systems.social: Coordination pressure → evolve from individuals → packs → hierarchy → civilization based on group benefits

pressure_driven_unlocks.no_level_gates: NO 'Level 5 unlock tin' - everything emerges from evolutionary pressure
pressure_driven_unlocks.deep_materials: Rare materials at depth require evolved excavation traits + durable tools
pressure_driven_unlocks.complex_tools: Advanced tools require material synthesis + high manipulation traits + social coordination
pressure_driven_unlocks.architecture: Building complexity emerges from population pressure + available technology + social organization
